firstServiceDescription: Get a lifetime electronic office within the HUN platform via its website WWW.HUN.CASH
secondServiceDescription: Activate (payment + purchasing) operations for conducting commercial exchanges between platform users exclusively via your mobile number.
thirdServiceDescription: Get an immediate commission (shopping voucher) for every new user through your referral, once only, based on their classification within your international balance for your electronic office. You can transfer it to your local balance if desired, based on the weekly pricing set by the platform for your country.
thirdServicePoint1: 1- For the Bronze card, you get / 0.25 shopping voucher /.
thirdServicePoint2: 2- For the Silver card, you get / 0.50 shopping voucher /.
thirdServicePoint3: 3- For the Gold card, you get / 1.00 shopping voucher /.
thirdServicePoint4: 4- For the VIP card, you get / 2.50 shopping voucher /.
thirdServiceDisclaimer: Note - Zero classified users do not earn a commission for a new user classified as Zero.
fourthServiceDescription: The holder of this classification is not eligible to participate in or enter the financial rewards program provided by the platform's management.
fifthServiceDescription: This card's value is restricted to the user only, without any international balance in their electronic office to begin commercial exchanges.
sixthServiceDescription: The user with this classification is entitled to withdraw their electronic financial balance worth /15 shopping vouchers/ every 24 hours from the withdrawal time.
seventhServiceDescription: The user with this classification is entitled to withdraw their national electronic financial balance fully whenever desired.
eighthServiceDescription: Increase your local financial balance at your electronic office. You can top up your local electronic currency balance through platform users or authorized branches.
ninthServiceDescription: Withdraw your local financial balance from your electronic office. You can withdraw your national electronic currency balance through platform users or authorized branches.
ninthServiceDisclaimer: Note - In case the transfer is done through private offices, exchange services, and banks, the sending and receiving commission is on the user's account.
tenthServiceDescription: Benefit from offers, discounts, and bookings provided to you by events contracted with the platform worldwide.
tenthServiceDisclaimer: Note: Prices listed for products and goods on contracted events' pages do not include shipping and delivery fees.
siteSecurityDescription: Maintaining the confidentiality and privacy of the financial transactions you perform and archiving them within your electronic office while ensuring the preservation of the financial balance in your accounts in case you lose your mobile phone.

bronzeDesc1.title: First Service
bronzeDesc1.content: Lifetime access to an electronic office on the HUN platform via its website WWW.HUN.CASH.

bronzeDesc2.title: Second Service
bronzeDesc2.content: Activate (payment + purchase) operations for commercial exchanges between platform users exclusively via your phone number.

bronzeDesc3.title: Third Service
bronzeDesc3.content:
You receive an instant commission (purchase voucher) for each new user registered through you, once only, based on their classification into your international office balance. You may convert it to local balance according to the weekly exchange rate set by the platform administration in your country – as follows:

  • 1- Bronze card: /0.25 purchase voucher/
  • 2- Silver card: /0.50 purchase voucher/
  • 3- Gold card: /1.00 purchase voucher/
  • 4- VIP card: /2.50 purchase voucher/

bronzeDesc4.title: Fourth Service
bronzeDesc4.content: A /1.00 purchase voucher/ international balance is gifted to your office by HUN platform management to activate commercial exchange.

bronzeDesc5.title: Fifth Service
bronzeDesc5.content: An international balance of /0 purchase vouchers/ is deposited in your office as a trust by HUN Platform – This service is currently suspended.

bronzeDesc6.title: Sixth Service
bronzeDesc6.content: When your electronic office reaches /10/ users of bronze or higher classification, you get a first reward from HUN management of /2.5 purchase vouchers/ as international balance – one time only.

bronzeDesc7.title: Seventh Service
bronzeDesc7.content: When your office reaches /20/ users (10 previous + 10 new) of bronze or higher classification, you get a second reward of /2.5 purchase vouchers/ as international balance – one time only.

bronzeDesc8.title: Eighth Service
bronzeDesc8.content: When your office reaches /30/ users (20 previous + 10 new) of bronze or higher classification, you get a third reward of /2.5 purchase vouchers/ as international balance – one time only.

bronzeDesc9.title: Ninth Service
bronzeDesc9.content: When your office reaches /40/ users (30 previous + 10 new) of bronze or higher classification, you get a fourth and final reward of /2.5 purchase vouchers/ as international balance – one time only.

bronzeDesc10.title: Tenth Service
bronzeDesc10.content: Users of this classification are allowed to withdraw a financial electronic balance of /25 purchase vouchers/ every 24 hours from the withdrawal time.

bronzeDesc11.title: Eleventh Service
bronzeDesc11.content: Increase your local electronic financial balance – You can top up your balance in national electronic currency through platform users, authorized branches, or contracted banks in your location – via one of the platform's electronic communication methods.

bronzeDesc12.title: Twelfth Service
bronzeDesc12.content:
Withdraw your local financial balance from your electronic office – You can withdraw your balance in national electronic currency through platform users, authorized branches, or contracted banks in your area – via one of the platform’s communication methods.

Note: If sending via private offices, exchanges, or banks, transfer fees are the user's responsibility.

bronzeDesc13.title: Thirteenth Service
bronzeDesc13.content:
Benefit from offers, discounts, and bookings provided by entities contracted with the platform around the world.

Note: The listed prices for products and goods on the partner page do not include shipping and delivery charges. Transfer fees are the user's responsibility.

bronzeDesc14.title: Fourteenth Service
bronzeDesc14.content: Security & Protection: Preserve the confidentiality and privacy of your financial operations, archived in your electronic office, and ensure the safety of your financial block in case your mobile phone is lost.

manageSite.title: Site Management
manageSite.content: Security & Protection: Preserve the confidentiality and privacy of your financial operations, archived in your electronic office, and ensure the safety of your financial block in case your mobile phone is lost.

1.title: First Service
1.content: You get a lifetime electronic office on the HUN platform via its website WWW.HUN.CASH

2.title: Second Service
2.content: Activate (payment + purchase) operations for exclusive commercial exchanges between platform users via your phone number.

content.text: You get an instant commission (purchase voucher) for every new user through you, once only, based on their classification in your international balance. You can transfer it to local balance based on the weekly pricing by the platform’s admin for your country - as follows:

4.title: Fourth Service
4.content: Your office is gifted a 3.00 purchase voucher international balance by HUN platform to activate trading.

5.title: Fifth Service
5.content: A fixed 0 purchase voucher is credited as a trust to your account by HUN – currently this service is paused.

6.title: Sixth Service
6.content: When you reach 10 users classified as Silver and above through your office, you receive a one-time international bonus of 5.0 purchase vouchers from HUN.

7.title: Seventh Service
7.content: At 20 users (previous 10 + 10 new) of Silver and above classification, you receive a second one-time international bonus of 5.0 purchase vouchers from HUN.

8.title: Eighth Service
8.content: At 30 users (previous 20 + 10 new) of Silver and above classification, you receive a third one-time international bonus of 5.0 purchase vouchers from HUN.

9.title: Ninth Service
9.content: At 40 users (previous 30 + 10 new) of Silver and above classification, you receive a final one-time international bonus of 5.0 purchase vouchers from HUN.

10.title: Tenth Service
10.content: Silver card users can spend up to 50 purchase vouchers every 24 hours from the time of spending.

11.title: Eleventh Service
11.content: You can increase your local balance in your electronic office using the national electronic currency via platform users, authorized branches, or partner banks in your area – through any platform communication method.

content.text: You can withdraw your local balance using the national e-currency via platform users, authorized branches, or contracted banks in your area – through electronic contact with the platform.
Note: If transfer is done through private offices, exchanges, or banks, the user bears the transaction fees.
Benefit from offers, discounts, and reservations offered by the platform’s partners worldwide.
Note: Prices of products/services listed on the partner activities page do not include shipping and delivery charges. The user bears the transaction fees.

manage.title: Management Service
manage.content: Security and protection: Maintain confidentiality of your financial transactions, archive them in your office, and ensure balance safety in case of mobile phone loss.

firstServiceDesc: Lifetime access to an electronic office on the HUN platform via www.hun.cash.
secondServiceDesc: Enable payments and purchases for business exchanges exclusively among platform users using your mobile number.
thirdServiceDesc: You receive an instant (shopping voucher) commission for every new user you refer (once only), based on their classification, credited to your international balance. You can transfer it to local balance weekly according to HUN's pricing:
fourthServiceDesc: A 5.00 shopping voucher is gifted to your electronic office by HUN to activate trading.
fifthServiceDesc: A fixed 0 voucher is held in trust by HUN. (Service currently suspended.)
sixthServiceDesc: When you have 10 gold or higher users, you receive a one-time reward of 10 vouchers.
seventhServiceDesc: When you reach 20 gold or higher users (10 previous + 10 new), you receive a second one-time reward of 10 vouchers.
eighthServiceDesc: When you reach 30 gold or higher users (20 previous + 10 new), you receive a third one-time reward of 10 vouchers.
ninthServiceDesc: When you reach 40 gold or higher users (30 previous + 10 new), you receive a final one-time reward of 10 vouchers.
tenthServiceDesc: Gold users can withdraw up to 100 vouchers every 24 hours.
eleventhServiceDesc: Add local currency to your account via other users, certified agents, or partner banks using electronic communication methods.
twelfthServiceDesc: Withdraw local currency from your account via other users, certified agents, or partner banks using electronic communication methods.
twelfthNote: Note: If sent via agents or banks, transfer fees are borne by the user.
therteenthServiceDesc: Enjoy offers, discounts, and reservations from platform-affiliated businesses worldwide.
therteenthNote: Note: Product prices do not include shipping. Transfer fees are borne by the user.
manageSiteDesc: Maintain privacy and archive your transactions. Your funds are protected even if you lose your phone.

service1.title: First Service
service1.desc: You receive a lifelong electronic office within the HUN platform via its website WWW.HUN.CASH

service2.title: Second Service
service2.desc: Activation of (payment + purchase) transactions to carry out commercial exchanges exclusively between platform users through your mobile number.

service3.title: Third Service
desc: You receive an instant commission (purchase voucher) for each new user you refer, only once, based on their classification, into your international balance. You may transfer it to the local balance according to weekly pricing by platform management in your country - as follows:

service4.title: Fourth Service
service4.desc: A gift international balance of /10.00 voucher/ from HUN platform to activate your business exchange.

service5.title: Fifth Service
service5.desc: A fixed international balance of /0 voucher/ is assigned as a trust deposit with HUN platform - this service is currently suspended.

service6.title: Sixth Service
service6.desc: When your office reaches /10/ users with VIP classification, you receive a one-time reward of /25 voucher/ from HUN platform.

service7.title: Seventh Service
service7.desc: When your office reaches /20/ VIP users (10 old + 10 new), you receive a second one-time reward of /25 voucher/ from HUN platform.

service8.title: Eighth Service
service8.desc: When your office reaches /30/ VIP users (20 old + 10 new), you receive a third one-time reward of /25 voucher/ from HUN platform.

service9.title: Ninth Service
service9.desc: When your office reaches /40/ VIP users (30 old + 10 new), you receive a fourth and final one-time reward of /25 voucher/ from HUN platform.

service10.title: Tenth Service
service10.desc: VIP users are allowed to spend /005 voucher/ every 24 hours from the time of the last withdrawal.

service11.title: Eleventh Service
service11.desc: Increase your local financial balance via other users, platform branches, or contracted banks – through one of the electronic communication channels with platform management.

service12.title: Twelfth Service
desc: Withdraw your local balance from your electronic office – through platform users, branches, or contracted banks – using platform's communication channels.
Note: In case of using external offices or banks, transfer/withdrawal fees are charged to the user.

service13.title: Thirteenth Service
desc: Benefit from offers, discounts, and bookings from activities contracted with the platform globally.
Note: Prices for products shown on the partner activities page do not include shipping/delivery charges. Transfer/withdrawal fees are at the user’s expense.

manage.title: Account Management
manage.desc: Security & Safety: Your financial operations are securely archived within your office. Your balances are protected even in case of mobile phone loss.

whoUs.title: Who We Are
whoUs.intro: We are young entrepreneurial minds in providing digital business services in the smart world, through contracts, agreements, and deals with various economic events (public, joint, private) aiming to market their products, business, and trade and activate the feature of direct sales using comprehensive electronic money.
whoUs.credentialsText: This platform has a deposit certificate from the Syrian Arab Republic -- Ministry of Culture -- Number/4829/ dated 9/7/2023
whoUs.systemFeature1: An integrated digital economy system powered by AI technologies
whoUs.systemFeature2: Facilitating business processes and securing scientific and practical relations
whoUs.systemFeature3: Protecting and marketing innovations and inventions globally
whoUs.systemFeature4: Exclusive and secure electronic payment system
whoUs.howItWorksStep1: 1. The user reads the joining terms and selects the appropriate subscription category
whoUs.howItWorksStep2: 2. The form is filled out after obtaining the subscription card number
whoUs.howItWorksStep3: 3. A verification message is sent to the mobile phone and the user’s digital office is created
whoUs.howItWorksStep4: 4. The user can manage their financial files and track their profits through their digital office
whoUs.legalCommitmentText: We confirm our full commitment to the laws of the country we operate within its administrative and geographical borders and all its systems, without violating international laws related to technological activities and digital transformation.

Are you sure you want to delete: Are you sure you want to delete
